front.title: RSVP-TE Extensions for Configuration SRLG of an FA

abstract.t: This memo provides extensions for the Resource ReserVation Protocol- Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE) for the support of the automatic configuration the SRLG of the Forwarding Adjacency (FA). Zhang Expires January 2011 [page 1] draft-zhang-ccamp-srlg-fa-configuration-00.txt July 2010
